mapper.sql: WITH task_view AS (select * from ((select distinct RES.* from ACT_RU_TASK RES inner join ACT_RU_IDENTITYLINK I on I.TASK_ID_ = RES.ID_ INNER JOIN ACT_RE_PROCDEF ARP ON ARP.ID_ = RES.PROC_DEF_ID_ WHERE RES.ASSIGNEE_ is null and I.TYPE_ = 'candidate' and RES.SUSPENSION_STATE_ = 1) union (select distinct RES.* from ACT_RU_TASK RES INNER JOIN ACT_RE_PROCDEF ARP ON ARP.ID_ = RES.PROC_DEF_ID_)) v ${ew.customSqlSegment}), efd AS (select * from ext_act_flow_data), arp As (select id_, name_ from act_re_procdef), arv AS (select proc_inst_id_, text_ from act_ru_variable where name_ = 'bpm_biz_title') SELECT task_view.*, efd.form_data_id, efd.oa_todo_id, arv.text_ AS bpm_biz_title, arp.name_ AS proc_def_name FROM task_view LEFT JOIN efd ON task_view.proc_inst_id_ = efd.process_inst_id LEFT JOIN arp ON task_view.proc_def_id_ = arp.id_ LEFT JOIN arv ON task_view.proc_inst_id_ = arv.proc_inst_id_
mapper.select: WITH his_procinst AS (select distinct RES.*, ARP.NAME_ as proc_def_name from act_hi_procinst RES INNER JOIN ACT_RE_PROCDEF ARP ON ARP.ID_ = RES.PROC_DEF_ID_), efd AS (select * from ext_act_flow_data), arv AS (select proc_inst_id_, text_ from act_hi_varinst where name_ = 'bpm_biz_title'), status AS (select proc_inst_id_, text_ from act_hi_varinst where name_ = 'bpm_status'), sys_user AS (SELECT username, realname FROM sys_user), result AS (SELECT his_procinst.id_ AS id, his_procinst.name_ AS name, his_procinst.proc_inst_id_ AS process_instance_id, his_procinst.proc_def_id_ AS process_definition_id, his_procinst.proc_def_name AS process_definition_name, his_procinst.start_time_ AS create_time, his_procinst.start_time_ AS create_time_, his_procinst.start_time_ AS start_time, his_procinst.end_time_ AS end_time, his_procinst.duration_ AS task_due_time, '' AS assignee, '' AS assignee_name, CASE WHEN his_procinst.delete_reason_ IS NOT NULL THEN replace(his_procinst.delete_reason_, '发起人', '') WHEN his_procinst.end_time_ IS NOT NULL THEN '已完成' END AS delete_reason, his_procinst.start_user_id_ AS start_user_id, u1.realname AS start_user_name, arv.text_ AS bpm_biz_title, COALESCE(efd.bpm_status, status.text_) AS bpm_status, COALESCE(efd.form_data_id, his_procinst.business_key_) AS business_id FROM his_procinst LEFT JOIN efd ON his_procinst.proc_inst_id_ = efd.process_inst_id LEFT JOIN arv ON his_procinst.proc_inst_id_ = arv.proc_inst_id_ LEFT JOIN status ON his_procinst.proc_inst_id_ = status.proc_inst_id_ LEFT JOIN sys_user u1 ON his_procinst.start_user_id_ = u1.username) SELECT * FROM result ${ew.customSqlSegment}
